title: The complaint of peace. Wryten in Latyn, by the famous clerke, Erasimus [sic] Roterodamus. And nuely translated into Englyshe by Thomas Paynell.
author: Erasmus, Desiderius, d. 1536.
publisher: In Paules Churchyard, by Ihon Cawoode, one of the prynters to the Quenes Maiestye],
notes: A translation, by Thomas Paynell, of a selection from: Erasmus, Desiderius.  Querela pacis.
Running title reads: The complaynt of peace.
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
